com.adidas.ui.input

Class InputStepsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseLocalizedActivity
      • com.adidas.ui.activities.BlurBackgroundActivity
        • com.adidas.ui.input.InputStepsActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FragmentStateListener, BaseFieldFragment.OnSwipedBackListener, InputStepListener, UiConst

    public abstract class InputStepsActivity
extends BlurBackgroundActivity
implements InputStepListener, BaseFieldFragment.OnSwipedBackListener, FragmentStateListener
    Base class for activities that show a sequence of inputs. Currently only on focus mode is implemented.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.adidas.ui.fragments.FragmentStateListener
